mapper.insert: insert into Qna(id, readcnt, root, step, indent, title, content, writer) values(seq_Qna.NEXTVAL, #{readcnt}, #{root}, #{step}, #{indent}, #{title}, #{content}, #{writer})
mapper.update: update Qna set(readcnt=#{readcnt}, root=#{root}, step=#{step}, indent={indent}, title=#{title}, content=#{content}, writer=#{writer})
